Plot: An African prince goes to Queens, New York City to find a wife whom he can respect for her intelligence and will.
Title: Coming to America
Writer: Eddie Murphy (story), David Sheffield (screenplay), Barry W. Blaustein (screenplay)
Actors: Eddie Murphy, Arsenio Hall, James Earl Jones, John Amos
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 5 wins & 2 nominations.
